item.title: Vagrant
item.description: Introduction Getting started with Vagrant Download the install the Vagrant from the Download section vagrant version Installed Version: 2.2.10 Latest Version: 2.2.10 You're running an up-to-date version of Vagrant! Download and install VirtualBox Now if both Vagrant and VirtualBox are up and running, all we need to do is run the below 3 commands to have a Ubuntu VM up and available for our use in no time. vagrant init hashicorp/bionic64 vagrant up vagrant ssh This is a pretty simple way to spin up a new Ubuntu VM, we can do a lot more which I will try to write up in later posts.
